GtkGraphPolarFormat Struct Reference

#include <gtkgraph.h>

Detailed Description

GtkGraphPolarFormat structure contains additional formatting information for polar graphs. This is an opaque structure and its contents should not be written to directly. Instead please use the API functions gtk_graph_set_polar_format() to modify the contents of this structure

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
  • gtkgraph.h
